name: Groob
description:
"Groob" is a thrilling and challenging roguelike game where players explore mysterious dungeons using tactical deck-building and intricate strategies. Players must construct their own powerful decks from a vast array of cards and battle formidable foes as they delve deeper into the dungeon. Throughout the journey, various choices await, requiring players to judge situations based on their skills and card combinations, ultimately selecting the optimal tactics to succeed.

Adapt to the ever-changing enemies and dungeon traps on each level, harnessing the cards and items you acquire to create the ultimate deck. In this game, players have access to a diverse range of cards, including attack, defense, healing, and special effects. Combine these cards to craft a unique deck and hone your tactics to perfection.

But beware! Falling in battle resets everything to zero. Failure is not an option, but that's what makes this game so exhilarating. High risks and rewards await the challenger. Achieve success and obtain powerful cards and items; fail, and lose it all, starting over from the beginning.

With a depth that appeals to both experts and beginners, the game is packed with replayable content that keeps you coming back for more. Pursue your own deck-building adventure and strive to conquer the depths of the dungeon with the ultimate strategy.
